sentence.Network_en: He succinctly summed up his manifesto as "Work hard, train hard and play hard".
sentence.Network_cn: 他把自己的宣言简练地总结为“努力干，努力练，努力玩”。

sentence.Network_en: He writes simply and succinctly, rarely adding too much adornment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的写作风格朴实简练, 很少添加饰词.

sentence.Network_en: No matter what question you are asked, answer it honestly and succinctly.
sentence.Network_cn: 总之,不管你在面试中被问到什么问题, 回答都要诚实而简明.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 当你使用标准库或者别的库写C++代码时,你得到的是短的代码,因为你可以简洁地(succinctly)表达你的思想。这就是我的理想。说你想说的。清晰地说。尽可能通用地说.
I think they had better tell us as succinctly as possible what has been happening ., 我想他们最好尽可能的扼要地把发生的事情告诉我们.
succinct简练的、简洁的；succinctly简洁地、简便地；succinctness（名词）简洁、简便；
乱花（钱等），浪费：squander简洁地，简明地：succinctly相当于的，相等于的：tantamount

list.abs: suc下面,cinct减去:把话的下面减去-简练的【反】voluble(adj 爱说话的);verbose(adj 详细冗长的);babble(v 喋喋不休)-express succinctly(简洁地表达)【同】.
more specifically 更具体地说more succinctly 更简洁地说more than 超出...的
say_百度百科 ... say stoutly 坚定地说 say succinctly 扼要地说 say sweepingly 一概而论地说.
...axiomaticcontroversial *不证自明的有争议的babbleexpress succinctly 闲聊，胡扯简洁地表达backhandedforthright 间接的直接的

entry.def: Something that is succinct expresses facts or ideas clearly and in few words.

example.ex: The book gives an admirably succinct account of the technology and its history...
example.tran: 这本书极其简明扼要地介绍了这项技术及其发展史。

example.ex: If you have something to say make sure that it is accurate, succinct and to the point.
example.tran: 在阐述观点时一定要准确、简洁、中肯。

means.word_mean: 1. with concise and precise brevity; to the point;

sentences.sentence: "Please state your case as succinctly as possible"

auth_sentence.content: So let me put this conundrum more succinctly.
auth_sentence.res_content: So let me put this conundrum more succinctly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So let me put this conundrum more succinctly.

auth_sentence.content: To this, the Gospels can reply succinctly: not very.
auth_sentence.res_content: To this, the Gospels can reply succinctly: not very.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To this, the Gospels can reply succinctly: not very.

auth_sentence.content: Others, including many other Democrats, put the matter more succinctly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Others, including many other Democrats, put the matter more succinctly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Others, including many other Democrats, put the matter more succinctly.
